title: My Education
body: My educational journey has helped me build a strong foundation in computer science, programming, and web technologies. Through hands-on learning and real-world projects, Iâ€™ve developed a passion for creating efficient and user-friendly digital experiences.

postGraduation.title: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
postGraduation.description: Specialized in Frontend Development and Web Technologies, focusing on modern frameworks like React, JavaScript, and Flutter. Gained in-depth knowledge of software development, data structures, and application design.

graduation.title: Bachelor of Science (Computer Science)
graduation.description: Built a strong foundation in programming, algorithms, and database management. Developed a keen interest in front-end design and coding best practices during academic projects.
